import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function LoginScreen({location}) { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

Sign in

setEmail(e.target.value)} value = {email}/>
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
setPassword(e.target.value)} value = {password} />
) }
